# Time series graphics
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
dat <- readxl::read_excel("../data/US10YTRR.xlsx")
with(dat, plot(date, price, type = "l"))
pacf(dat$price)
library(fpp3)
dat <- dat %>% 
  mutate(date = as.Date(date)) %>%
  as_tsibble(index = "date", regular = TRUE)%>%
  mutate(trading_day = row_number()) %>%
  tsibble(index = trading_day)
autoplot(dat, .vars = price)
dat %>%
  PACF(price) %>%
  autoplot() 

```
